#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long n,m,x,y,z,result;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
        x=n/m;
        y=m-1;
        z=n%m;
        result=((x*((y*(y+1))/2))+((z*(z+1))/2));
        printf("%lld\n",result);
    }

    return 0;
}
